description:
The fierce fight between Striders and Trinity Dragon draws to a close. Carrying the feelings of their team mates, the final match between Chrono Shindou and Tsuneto Tado begins. Who`s team will be the one participating in the U20!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Deciding Match!!! Striders VS Trinity Dragon!!!
決戦!!! ストライダーズVSトリニティドラゴン!!!
